remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of ~ 19.29 .  See also ~ r19.29r . (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.) 

---

 Theorem 19.29 of [Margaris] p. 90 with restricted quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement: r19.29 $p |- ( ( A. x e. A ph /\ E. x e. A ps ) -> E. x e. A ( ph /\ ps ) ) $.
